metadata.title: Jérôme Desmares - Freelance Tech Lead | MVP Developer & Fractional CTO
metadata.description: Freelance Tech Lead in France, Node.js & React expert. I build your MVP in 4-8 weeks. 10+ years experience, teams up to 11 devs. Free consultation.
metadata.ogTitle: Jérôme Desmares - Freelance Tech Lead | MVP & Architecture Expert
metadata.ogDescription: Need a fractional CTO for your startup? I turn ideas into products. MVP, POC, technical architecture. Free quote within 24h.

hero.name: Jérôme Desmares
hero.description: I turn your ideas into profitable products. MVP in 4-8 weeks, scalable architecture, production-ready code. From idea to launch, I've got you covered.

about.title: 10+ years building tech products
about.subtitle: From e-commerce entrepreneur to Engineering Manager, I've built products generating millions in revenue for my clients.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Entrepreneur
ecommerce.description: Built and scaled an online store to €200k annual revenue. Customer acquisition, conversion, logistics. I learned business by doing.

developer.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
developer.description: Built critical APIs in startups: Stripe payments, OAuth authentication, SaaS billing. Stack: Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL.

techlead.title: Tech Lead
techlead.description: Technical leadership of 3-6 developer teams. Microservices architecture, CI/CD, code reviews. Delivering complex products on time.

manager.title: Engineering Manager / Head of Engineering
manager.description: Managing teams up to 11 developers. Tech recruiting, product strategy, scaling organizations. Tech budgets of several hundred k€.

services.title: Freelance Tech Lead Services
services.subtitle: High-level technical expertise to accelerate your product growth.

mvp.title: MVP / POC Development
mvp.description: Validate your idea in 4-8 weeks with a functional product. I code your MVP from scratch with architecture built to scale. Test the market without technical risk.

architecture.title: Architecture & Development
architecture.description: Modern architecture design: RESTful/GraphQL APIs, microservices, event-driven. Performance optimization and technical debt reduction.

coaching.title: Fractional CTO
coaching.description: An experienced CTO without full-time costs. Technical direction, recruiting, code reviews, team upskilling. Available 1-4 days per week.

contact.title: Let's talk about your project
contact.subtitle: MVP, technical overhaul, dev recruiting? I respond within 24h with a free initial analysis of your needs.
contact.emailBody:
Hi Jérôme,

I'm reaching out to discuss a project.

Context:

Need:

Desired timeline:

Thanks!

jsonLd.description: Freelance Tech Lead specialized in MVP development and technical consulting for startups. Expert in Node.js, TypeScript, React. Based in France, available fully remote.
